resumo: Tech developer in transition, studying Systems Analysis and Development (FATEC-RP). Fluent in English (TOEIC 945) and experienced in customer service and credit analysis. Developed cloud-based apps using Python and Firebase REST APIs (Auth, NoSQL). Hands on with mobile development with Flutter/Dart and data-driven solutions using RSA cryptography, Scikit-learn ML, and Gurobi optimization. Delivered projects in computer vision with OpenCV. Applies Git/GitHub and Agile for collaboration and version control. Driven by empathy, autonomy and purpose — ready to add value to impact-driven tech teams.
